name: Plastiland
description: Plastiland is a puzzle-platformer set in a unique hand-made plasticine world. Guide our lovely clay characters through 48 levels of three worlds. Save as many of plastiballs as you can, reach far corners of each level by transforming them into one of eight roles, like cruncher, crusher, builder, and others.
minimum_requirements: Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 50 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game is really childlish and very lemmings (do you remember lemmings? it's a resurgence in different setting & style).   The gameplay is a real-time puzzle. The art is truly plastic and I would say remarkable and exceptoinal.  If you're 4-7 years old you should like the game.
Pretty cool and cute indie handmade game. It has some obvious issues but anyway worth playing.
Awful mobile port job. No control labels or anything, it's all guess work. Awful.

Basically you have to safetly land ♥♥♥♥ing clay figures. I hate these ♥♥♥♥ing clay figures. If my friend didn't get this for me while it was 80 cents, it would've been a ♥♥♥♥ing rip off. I wasted 7 hours of my life to beat this game for my boii m-a-x. ALso, getting 120 stars made me wanna ♥♥♥♥ing kill myself. Thanks ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s.
